subject: Order #SSN2712
description_text:
Hello, I received your pedals today, everything is there but the haptic reactors with cables and holders, could you check what went wrong and send them to me please?

Thank you in advance,

Matej Pavlát

conversations.body_text: Hi Matěj Pavlát,    This is the logistics tracking link for the haptic reactors:  https://t.17track.net/en#nums=SF6045930181215
